info.name: Inoreader Light tweaks
info.description:
Don't forget to leave a comment if you like this style or found something went wrong ;-)
- Remove clutters. Use light theme in inoreader preferences.
- Center align the articles.( based on InoreaderCB)
- Customize font in Style Setting* please read Additional Info.
info.additionalInfo:
- Always use apostrophe for your font! 
- You may use font installed on your device.
- For web font,  add @font-face o this stylesheet.
